item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kelsey add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "What is hardest to accept about the passage of time is that the people who once mattered the most to us wind up in parentheses." -- John Irving

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by John Irving
item.description: "If you care about something you have to protect it – If you’re lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it." -- John Irving

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books that are now written in a very foreign tongue. Do not now seek the answers, which cannot be given you because you would not be able to live them. And the point is, to live everything. Live the questions now. Perhaps you will then gradually, without noticing it, live along some distant day into the answer." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Kelsey add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness." -- Jonathan Safran Foer
